title: Married in Seattle: First Comes Marriage / Wanted: Perfect Partner
description: How to meet and marry a man in Seattle.There are all the usual ways, of course, but here’s how Janine Hartman and Meg Remington did it.Janine: My grandfather Hartman arranged a husband for me! Zach Thomas, the intended groom, was just as outraged as I was. But gramps insisted we’d be “a perfect match.” First Comes Marriage, according to him.Meg: My teenage daughter, Lindsey, had the nerve to place a personal ad on my behalf Wanted: Perfect Partner. Worse, Steve Conlan, who answered the ad, was perfect, according to her.Does Grandfather know best? Did a teenage matchmaker get it right? You decide!
author: Debbie Macomber
